casebody.data:
COKER, et al.
v.
DAIMLERCHRYSLER CORP. No. 532A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 9, 2006. Mona Lisa Wallace, Salisbury, Cathy Williams, K. Edward Greene, Raleigh, Gary K. Shipman, Wilmington, for James Coker, et al. *468Allison O. Van Laningham, Greensboro, Raymond M. Kethledge, Troy, MI, for DaimlerChrysler Corp. Jonathan Wall, Greensboro, for Academy of Trial Lawyers.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th day of January 2006 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (DaimlerChrysler Corp.) shall have up to and including the 14th day of February 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 9th day of January 2006."
